text: Hi, regarding the *chart* components, is there currently an option to format numbers? For instance, to display them as currency with separators?

I have been working on getting some CI/CD tooling for GitLab in our UI Extensions project. This `gitlab-ci.yml` might be helpful for others using GitLab for CI/CD. I still have a few things to add, but it could make a good boilerplate.

The primary benefit is that it has allowed us to use a single repository with multiple Projects/Apps for the different environments we need (Local, QA, Production). It uses GitLabs CI/CD variables and environments, as well as `jq` to change out JSON values just before the project is built and deployed to HubSpot.

Hope it helps someone :sunglasses:
Hi Jasper, today, it's not possible to manage layout of custom objects through code, but I will discuss your problem with the right team.
<@UV46D6DDY> you can display docx files with iFrames in modals.
This is something we are interested in too, bring able to place cards automatically in the Overview tab or a new tab in the middle pane would increase adoption. Also for sidebars.
